Job Description: Roles and Responsibilities: We are looking for a passionate developer who loves to tackle new challenges, learn new frameworks and technologies, and work alongside other developers. Continuously learn and grow as a software developer, keeping up to date with emerging technologies and trends.  Work with backend developers to integrate and consume restful APIs  Develop, test and maintain native SDK (software development kit) on iOS mobile platforms.  Deliver clean, well-tested code and meet project deadlines.  Adapt to current iOS updates and latest Apple products.  Good communication, analytical, and problem-solving skills  Help maintain code quality, organization, and automatization.Skills Required: Proficient experience in Swift  Strong programming & analytical skills  Familiarity with RESTful APIs to connect iOS applications to back-end services.  Strong C, Objective C programming concepts (optional)  Threading, Processes, etc  COCOA, Application Life Cycle  XCode  A knack for writing clean, readable, and easily maintainable code.  Good understanding of software development best practices  Passion for product quality and attention to detail  Passion for finding bottlenecks and thresholds in existing code  Schedule: Day shift  Work Remotely: No
